head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FILIP, PATRICIA A. (NEE JARIS)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FILIP, PATRICIA A. (NEE JARIS)

block.p: FILIP-Patricia A. (nee Jaris) of Cockeysville, MD on February 3, 2001. Beloved daughter of Ann and Joseph Jaris. Sister of Richard and William Jaris. Cherished aunt to Hannah, Lisa, Maggie, Liam and Danny. Niece of Lillian Lipchuck. Family will receive friends at the Andrett Funeral Home, 353 2nd Ave. (at 20th St.), NYC, Thursday, 7-9PM, Friday, 2-5 and 7-9PM. Mass of Christian Burial Saturday, 10AM, at the Immaculate Conception Church. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to the Maryland Chapter of the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society, 8600 LaSalle Road, Suite 314, Chester Building, Towson, MD. 21286.
